description: Protect your Samsung GALAXY 2 7.0" (Previous Generation) tablet when you're at home or on the go inside this sleek rooCASE Executive Portfolio Leather Case specifically made for Samsung GALAXY 2 7.0"Crafted with luxurious leather.Soft interior microfiber non-scratch lining.Features a detachable inner sleeve for hand-held operation which reattaches with industrial strength velcro for landscape or portrait orientation.It has dual zippers for easy access and offers access to all ports and controls.Business and ID slots, an accessory flap, and an elastic loop for your pen or stylus.The rooCASE promise    - 100% Satisfaction Guarantee    - Lifetime Warranty against manufacture defects    - Superb customer service
title: rooCASE Executive Portfolio (Black) Leather Case for Samsung GALAXY Tab 2 7.0 / Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7-Inch Student Edition
